content: this is my simple all in one crocodile pattern it is designed to be worked in one piece without having to join on any other parts it takes around 30 mins to complete one croc very useful for gifts as it works up quickly and easily you can use any weight / ply of yarn it is great for stash busting please see my other all in one patterns also please do not upload the pattern into facebook group files without permission if you could just share a link to this page that would be great thank you
